page.title: 06Newburgh Highland Games
page.content: The{Highland Games}are held up at{Mugdrum Park.}It is an annual event and draws in quite a crowd.{Radio Tay (our local radio station) usually has a stand there and they hold competitions like name that tune and true or false. There are many races such as the 800 metres. I have come in second last and fourth last. There are also the 1600 metres and the 400 metres. In 1984{Geoff Capes}competed in the tossing the caber event .There are lots of small stalls where you can buy food .The Highland Games are a great family outing .If you get bored with the games you can go to the funfair which is just outside the park. Every year the local schools compete in a relay race for a trophy. Newburgh School has won it for four years in a row.
